text: is a railway station located in Sakkuru (咲来), Otoineppu, Nakagawa District (Teshio), Hokkaidō prefecture, and is operated by the Hokkaido Railway Company. ==Lines serviced== *Hokkaido Railway Company :*Sōya Main Line ==Adjacent stations== ==External links== *Ekikara Time Table - JR Teshiogawa- Onsen Station Category:Railway stations in Hokkaido Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1987
title: Teshiogawa-Onsen Station
